help.Description: output a list of commands and global arguments or output help about a command

Syntax.commandName: help about the command with name commandName

Options.-v: enable verbose: add details to normal output
Options.--info: output additional informations about the command line context

exclude-ambiguous-syntax.--exclude-ambiguous-syntax: exclude any ambiguous syntax when parsing command line arguments. By default, the first matching syntax is selected in the command line arguments parser. If this option is set syntaxes of a command can't be ambiguous

parser-logging.--parser-logging logLevel: set up the logging level of the parser. Possibles values from Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.LogLevel. If 'Trace' or 'Debug' the parser add detailed informations about the parsed syntaxes

disable-global-help.--disable-global-help: disable the command line parser command help
